mapper.insert: insert into member (id, pw, nickname, profile) values(#{id}, #{pw}, #{nickname}, #{profile, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update member set nickname = #{nickname}, profile = #{profile} where id = #{id}
update member set enabled where id=#{id}
mapper.delete: update member set enabled = 0 where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select pw from member where id = #{id}
select count(*) from member where nickname=#{nickname}
